headline: Protecting Remote Desktops at Scale with Cloudflare Access
keywords: Cloudflare Access, Security, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Zero Trust
description: Today we are announcing Argo Tunnel RDP Bastion mode, a simpler way to protect RDP connections at scale. By functioning as a jump-host, cloudflared can reside on a single node in your network and proxy requests to any internal server, eliminating deployment headaches.
